First, we will read in the numdeath matched with numapp file.  
```{r}
ss5 <- fread("/data/josh/CenSoc/ss5_data/merged_application_death/ss5_merged_with_numdeath_1940.csv", colClasses = list(character= 'ssn'))
```

Read in the census file. 

```{r, eval = F}

## Load census with HISTID
census_2019 <- load_census(census_file = "/home/ipums/casey-ipums/IPUMS2019/1920/TSV/P.tsv")
```

## Merge SS-5 and Census Files on linking keys: 1930
```{r, eval = F}
censoc_all_gender <- census_ss5_merge(ss5 = ss5, census = census_2019)

censoc_all_gender <- clean_wcensoc(censoc_all_gender, census_year = 1940)

fwrite(censoc_all_gender, "../../ipums/casey-ipums/censoc_male_and_female_sample_matched_with_census_1930.csv")
```
